description:
Well, I got Robert back to top a guy. He still seems uncertain about it, but yet again, he seems REALLY interested in coming back and trying it again.
So I really wanna see where this goes with him. I think his nervousness is charming, and I wanna watch him grow into this like we did some of the other guys.
You've already met Nicholas, and he was eager to take on a straight guy.
I have to admit this is not one of my better cumshots (How's that for a sales pitch!). I've been nailing them recently but I definitely didn't get a clear shot. So you gotta remember, this IS amateur porn. Still, there are two nice loads. The irony is, if you watch the "out" take at the end, there would have likely have been a great cumshot facial had we not just been starting out. I also left in some directorial stuff in the middle cuz I thought it was kinda cool.
Enjoy!
title: Nicholas & Robert - Wrapped
